lineStatuses.reason: London Overground: No service between Surrey Quays and Clapham Junction while we fix a signal failure at Denmark Hill. No service between Gospel Oak and Barking due to planned engineering work. A rail replacement bus service operates. GOOD SERVICE on all other routes.

disruption.description: London Overground: No service between Surrey Quays and Clapham Junction while we fix a signal failure at Denmark Hill. No service between Gospel Oak and Barking due to planned engineering work. A rail replacement bus service operates. GOOD SERVICE on all other routes.

lineStatuses.reason: LONDON OVERGROUND: Saturday 4 June to Friday 23 September 2016, there will be no service between South Tottenham and Barking on weekdays, and no service between Gospel Oak and Barking on weekends, due to Network Rail improvement works. From Saturday 24 September until February 2017, there is no service between Gospel Oak and Barking on all days of the week. Replacement buses operate.

disruption.description: LONDON OVERGROUND: Saturday 4 June to Friday 23 September 2016, there will be no service between South Tottenham and Barking on weekdays, and no service between Gospel Oak and Barking on weekends, due to Network Rail improvement works. From Saturday 24 September until February 2017, there is no service between Gospel Oak and Barking on all days of the week. Replacement buses operate.
disruption.additionalInfo: For more information, ticketing and travel advice, visit www.tfl.gov.uk/london-overground-closureReplacement buses operateRoute T, daily: Walthamstow Central (for London Underground Victoria line and London Overground Chingford Services) - Leyton Midland Road - Leytonstone High Road (Harrow Green) - Wanstead Park - Woodgrange Park - East Ham (for London Underground District and Hammersmith & City line, set down only towards Barking, pick up only towards Walthamstow) - Barking. Route J, weekends only until Sunday 17 September, then daily from Saturday 24 September: Gospel Oak Station (Highgate Road) - Upper Holloway - Crouch Hill - Finsbury Park (for London Underground Piccadilly and Victoria line and National Rail Great Northern services) - not served on Saturday 9 July between 2130 and 2330 or on Sunday 10 July between 2100 and 2300 - Harringay Green Lanes - Seven Sisters (for London Underground Victoria line and London Overground Enfield Town / Cheshunt services and South Tottenham) For travel between Seven Sisters and Walthamstow Central, use London Underground Victoria line (valid tickets are accepted for entrance and exit at Seven Sisters, Tottenham Hale, Blackhorse Road and Walthamstow Central only) or local London Buses services via any reasonable routes.
